text.section: If an inmate violates the applicable rules of discipline, the Division may revoke a portion or all of the diminution credits awarded under §§ 3-704 (good conduct) and 3-707 (special projects) of this subtitle according to the nature and frequency of the violation.
This section does not affect the diminution credits awarded under §§ 3-705 (work tasks) and 3-706 (education) of this subtitle.

section.section: The Division may restore diminution credits revoked under this section.
The Commissioner shall adopt regulations governing the restoration of revoked diminution credits.
